title: Heartache High
description: You can never leaveHow close have you come to finding yourself enrolled at Heartache High?Closer than you think, if you’ve ever been in love with someone who didn’t know you existed. Or someone who broke up with you, leaving you broken-hearted.At Heartache High, you’ll find yourself surrounded by students just like you.People who endlessly hope it won’t always be a hopeless love.Problem is, once you’ve enrolled at Heartache High, you can never leave.
author: Jon Jacks
